tooltip.faraway.mango_seed.tooltip: A mango seed. Plant it to grow a Mango Tree.
tooltip.faraway.mango.tooltip: A mango. Tasty. MANGO MANGO MANGO MA-
tooltip.faraway.resin.tooltip: "A strange yellow mineral, similar to resin found on Earth. I feel it speaks to me. Maybe... the Ancients used it in their technology?"
tooltip.faraway.coconut.tooltip: the coco nut is a big brown nut
tooltip.faraway.coconut_flesh.tooltip: The juicy flesh of a coconut, fresh in the shell. A sweet bounty of nature!
